title: Zype Raises $1.6M To Help Publishers Build Their Video Business
description: Video startup Zype has raised $1.6 million in seed funding. The company says it can help online publishers deliver their videos across devices. Instead of just posting their videos on YouTube or Vimeo or another platform and hoping for the best, Zype allows them to build their own sites and apps, leveraging the company’s Dynamic Player Technology to serve the best video for each… Read More
